body_html: @sugartom I have tried to rebuild the source, but I added some parameters "--local_resources 2048,.5,1.0" when I used bazel. You can fix 2048 to 8096 or else based on your environment. I once tried 2048, it take long time to do. I suggest you can set bigger if you want to fast. Good luck!

body: @sugartom I have tried to rebuild the source, but I added some parameters "--local_resources 2048,.5,1.0" when I used bazel. You can fix 2048 to 8096 or else based on your environment. I once tried 2048, it take long time to do. I suggest you can set bigger if you want to fast. Good luck!
